title: Shortwave hands-on: Sliding into the Inbox void [Video]
content:
Inbox’s demise was one of the most painful for millions of fans of the Gmail replacement. The very best of Inbox lives on through the team behind Shortwave.

more…

The post Shortwave hands-on: Sliding into the Inbox void [Video] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Shortwave might actually be the second coming of the popular Inbox client for Gmail in all but name which is music to hardcore fans' ears.
